channel.description: Recent content in config on a2n-s' Personal Website & Blog

item.title: Config
item.description: This is the config section. the entire doc here. the doftiles (*) for my Arch setup. my dmenu rice (*). my polybar (*). all the dmscripts (*) I use. my wallpapers (*). (*) means that the field comes from another place. Clicking will redirect you there. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Go back to the front page.
item.content:
This is the config section.

  • the entire doc here.
  • the doftiles (*) for my Arch setup.
  • my dmenu rice (*).
  • my polybar (*).
  • all the dmscripts (*) I use.
  • my wallpapers (*).

(*) means that the field comes from another place. Clicking will redirect you there.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the front page.

item.title: Configs's Doc
item.description: This page allows the user to redirect to the different docs of my config, as the latter is composed of many different blocks. One can find information below: the dotfiles for my Arch setup. the scripts I use to make my life easier. my dmenu rice. my polybar. all the dmscripts I use. my wallpapers. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Go back to the doc or to the front page.
item.content:
This page allows the user to redirect to the different docs of my config, as the latter is composed of many different blocks.
One can find information below:

  • the dotfiles for my Arch setup.
  • the scripts I use to make my life easier.
  • my dmenu rice.
  • my polybar.
  • all the dmscripts I use.
  • my wallpapers.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the doc or to the front page.
